name: Encore ENEWI-1XN45 802.11a/b/g/n PCIe x1 Wi-Fi Adapter
Security: 64/128-bits WEP Encryption, WPA-PSK, WPA2-PSK, WPA, WPA2
Antenna: 1 x 5dBi dipole antenna with R-SMA connector
Operating Range: Indoor: Up to 100m, Outdoor: Up to 300m
Features: [PCI Express Rev. 1.1, Automatically Prioritize Wireless Traffic to Reduce Time Lags during Online Gaming, Video Streaming, and VoIP, Support IEEE 802.11e QoS Enhancement (WMM, WMM-SA client mode), Cisco Compatible extensions (CCX) for WLAN devices]
